alert.note: Alert for Vance; Warren (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:28PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Vance and central Warren Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 328 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Henderson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Warrenton, Norlina, Middleburg, Macon, Satterwhite Point Marina, Drewry, Afton, South Henderson and Wise. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
